motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of July 8, 2024 meeting minutes and resolution appointing a member of the Sustainability Committee.

motions.title: Ordinance Defining Community Residences and Recovery Communities (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of ordinance to define Community Residences and Recovery Communities with revised distance requirements - 1 mile between recovery communities and 2,000 feet from schools.
